description.p: When drinking a Wild Mint Tea you immediately get more comfortable around strangers and want to invite people, even strangers, into your home. This state holds for 30 minutes, after which you fall into a deep sleep, which takes up to 8 hours.

Allows for save passage through daylight. When you drink this tea, you no longer suffer from any negative effects from sunlight (eg. Sunlight Sensitivity). This Tea is known to cause a dependence. If you take it more often than 1 + CON (min. 1) times a week, then you become dependent. As long as you are dependent on this herb, you need to take it daily or suffer the following effects: Disadvantage on INT and WIS Ability Checks for 1 week.

When drinking this tea, you enter a transcendent status, where you perceive the real and astral worlds at the same time. While in this state you have Disadvantage on INT Ability Checks and Saving Throws. This State holds for 10 minutes. After the 10 minutes have elapsed, you need to succeed a DC 15 WIS Saving Throw, or take 2d10 psychic damage.

When drinking this potion, you become immune to any effects the Sun usually gives you. This applies to any disadvantages or penalities standing in direct sunlight might give you. Best suited for Vampires or Dark elves. The effect lasts for 24h.

This potion was given to Seri Kelthrai from an Old lady, telling him that he may drink from it three times. The first time gives you a vision. The second time gives you a nightmare. The third time gives you insanity.
This small medicine was sold by Morbius in Hildum of the past.

When drinking this potion, it's effect starts to take form. After 1 minute you teleport all creatures touching you within 5 ft. of you. You can teleport to a point that you can see and where all creatures touching you will fit.
